name: Barbie Dreamtopia Mermaid Doll
details: This Barbie mermaid doll features a pastel pink bodice, translucent fin, pink and blue ombre tail with sculpted star details, blue fantasy hair, and a royal tiara.

name: American Girl Doll Lila Monetti
details: Lila Monetti, the 2024 Girl of the Year, comes with horse riding accessories and a storybook about her adventures. Includes leotards and gear from GK Elite.

name: Nendoroid Doll Holo
details: From 'Spice and Wolf,' this Nendoroid Doll includes interchangeable hands, a wheat pouch, and magnetic shoes. Highly articulated and dressed in detailed outfits.

name: Steiff Collectible Teddy Bear
details: A high-quality teddy bear made with premium materials, part of the Steiff collectorâ€™s showcase. Comes with a certificate of authenticity.

name: Gotz Doll Emily
details: Emily is a beautifully crafted 18-inch doll with rooted hair and lifelike features. She comes dressed in a stylish outfit and shoes.

name: Charlie Bears Minimo Collection
details: Part of the limited-edition Minimo Collection, this bear features intricate detailing and comes with a custom display stand.

name: Zwergnase Junior Doll
details: Handmade in Germany, this artist doll is highly detailed with hand-painted features and a unique outfit. Limited availability.

name: Sylvia Natterer Petitcollin Doll
details: Designed by Sylvia Natterer, this doll is crafted from high-quality vinyl and comes with a detailed wardrobe and accessories.

name: Mia Dolls Spanish Collection
details: Full vinyl doll made in Spain, featuring a lifelike appearance and traditional Spanish dress.

name: Hildegard Gunzel Doll
details: A premium collectible doll from renowned artist Hildegard Gunzel, featuring exquisite detailing and hand-sewn clothing.

name: Isabelle Bear 2024
details: This limited-edition bear from the Isabelle collection features mohair fur and comes with a unique accessory set.

name: Kaloo Plush Doll
details: Soft and cuddly plush doll from Kaloo, perfect for young children. Machine washable and safe for all ages.

name: Kathe Kruse Baby Doll
details: Handmade baby doll from Kathe Kruse, featuring a soft body and realistic facial features. Suitable for ages 3 and up.

name: Little Bird Told Me Rocking Horse
details: A beautifully crafted rocking horse with a soft plush body and sturdy wooden frame. Suitable for toddlers.

name: Mary Meyer Bunny
details: Adorable bunny plush toy from Mary Meyer, made with high-quality materials and embroidered details. Perfect for snuggling.

name: Nataliya Chernikova Doll
details: Exquisite handcrafted doll by Nataliya Chernikova, featuring intricate clothing and lifelike features. Limited edition.

name: Shiznits Rag Doll
details: Hand-sewn rag doll from Shiznits, made with soft fabrics and embroidered features. Safe for all ages.

name: Sigikid Plush Bear
details: Soft and cuddly plush bear from Sigikid, perfect for children of all ages. Made with safe and durable materials.

name: Alpaca Stuffed Animal
details: A cute and fluffy alpaca plush toy, perfect for hugging and cuddling. Made from premium materials for extra softness.

details: Soft and cuddly plush doll from Kaloo, perfect for young children. Machine washable and safe for all ages.
